name: DOSWord
description:
DOSWord is a port of Wordle to DOS.

REQUIREMENTS

  • 486 CPU or better (with or w/out FPU; non-FPU users should run DOSWORDE.EXE)
  • VGA mode 13h-compatible display adapter
  • MS-DOS 5 (I think) or later

CREDITS

  • Port by @foxgirl_irl (kokoscript)
  • Original game by Josh Wardle (@powerlanguish)
  • See also: WOR-DOS by vitawrap, for 16-bit systems
